EmailTemplate.description: VILT Welcome email for the Europe Swedish Practitioner Course
EmailTemplate.name: Cert Welcome Europe Enterprise VILT Swedish
EmailTemplate.subject: Change Management Certification Programme | Prework and Programme Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to your participation in {!Training_Event}
Programme Dates: {!Training_Event__c.Start_Date__c} - {!Training_Event__c.End_Date__c} at {!Training_Event__c.Location__c}
Our goal is to equip you with knowledge, skills, and tools to drive successful change.
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Prework Requirements
To maximize your in-programme learning experience, you will need to complete a number of prework tasks. You should allow 2 hours to complete as it is a critical component to support your learning experience.
Set-up your Prosci Portal Access and Prework tasks
You will receive an email shortly from portal@prosci.com with a link to your programme prework in the Prosci Portal as well as access to additional content, resources and tools to support your in-programme learning.
Once in the Prosci portal, click the “Prework” tile. You should see a drop-down menu that says “Prework Tasks”. Prework is due 4 business days before your programme to allow your instructor time to review.
Hard copy materials
A set of materials will be couriered before the programme to the shipping address that was provided during registration (check spam for tracking notifications from the courier). There are no action items that need to be taken from these materials prior to the programme start. Please contact us if you have not received your materials by 4 business days prior to the programme start date.
Here is the shipping address you provided during registration that your materials will be shipped to:
{!Contact.MailingAddress}
Schedule
The schedule below indicates the time you will be required to be live online. Please note, there will be 8 hours of dedicated class time on Day 1 and Day 2 and 7 hours on Day 3, all with frequent breaks throughout the session. Please estimate roughly 1 hour of additional self-study on Day 1 and 2.
Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
Day 1 - 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM Plus one hour of self-study after class
Day 2 - 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM Plus one hour of self-study after class
Day 3 - 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM
Or can we use merge field {!Training_Event__c.Programme_Schedule__c} ???
To add this to your Outlook Calendar, please click on the attachment.
Please be aware that you may not become certified if any training is missed.
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training each day.
What You Need for Success as a Virtual Learner
Your learning experience is very important to us. In the virtual environment, the following will greatly enhance your experience and success:
Uninterrupted time to focus.
Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility
High-speed internet connection
Webcam capable of streaming you by video
Audio headset or audio connection with speaker and microphone
You will receive an email a few days before your programme that will include specific information on how to access your session via your virtual meeting link/ID
Our delivery team will be online 15 minutes before the start of class each day. We ask that you join early to confirm that your technology is working.
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com.
Best regards,
Xxxxx Xxxxx
Training Coordinator
CONNECT WITH US:
Prosci Europe SRL (comprising the former Prosci affiliates CMC Partnership and Nexum) is the new European division of Prosci, operating in Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, the UK and Switzerland. See https://www.proscieurope.com/prosci-europe for the list of registered offices.
